page.title: 05MEDICAL SERVICES IN THE TOWN
page.content: Local medical services are good.The nearest{general hospital}is{50 miles {away.}At the{Health Centre}there are nurses, dentist, chiropodist, an optician, two receptionists and the doctor is {Doctor Hallam.} The{nurses}are Sister Wood, the {School Nurse}is Mrs.Bell and the {Health Visitor}is Mrs.Woolner.The{ {Chiropodist}Margaret Taylor looks after the old age pensioners. Mrs.Miller the{Phsiotherapist} looks after people who've had strokes or people with broken bones and other injuries.An {Optician }Stephen Baggot attends the clinic once a week. The{School Dentist}Mr.Magarry also attends the clinic, Mr.Watt is the {Town Dentist.}An ambulance service based at Brough takes patients to Carlisle etc.and to the Health Centre. {
